name: love is blind, so i'm killing it.
name_original: love is blind, so i'm killing it.
description: hi. i'm hate. you might not believe me, but i'm sure of it. love is blind and makes people blind. i've wanted to kill it for a while, but i've been dead for just as long. recently, i came across a small thread that lead to a ball of yarn that lead to- it's a long story, really. the point is, i'm alive now, and intend to make as many hearts as possible see before some blinded person kills me again. so. guide me through this realm of yours, mortal.
